title: refactor(http-server): flatten 7-level nesting in body streaming callback
body:
## Description

Deep nesting (depth 7) in `server_process_client_event()` at line 1233 in `src/http/SocketHTTPServer.c`.

## Location

- **File**: `src/http/SocketHTTPServer.c`
- **Lines**: 1203-1259
- **Function**: `server_process_client_event`

## Current Code

The body streaming callback handling is nested 7 levels deep within multiple conditional blocks.

## Recommendation

Extract the streaming body handling into a separate helper function to flatten the nesting. Consider:
- `server_process_streaming_body()`
- Early returns for error conditions

## Severity

HIGH (depth 7)
